name: Corgo's bakery
description:
A game for fast cake makers

Corgo has inherited his grandfather's bakery. Quick! Put the cakes on the platforms one after another to get them prepared and properly boxed so that they can be delivered.

_________

This is my first finished project as a gamedev. I did the design and programming myself using Illustrator and Unity. Since it's my first I know it still needs a lot of polish, but I'm proud I could get this project to the end! Hope you'll enjoy playing it.
